about_the_game:
"God Souls" mainly focuses on the bloody combat experience and rich level design, similar to Prince of Persia, God of War and so on. Chaos is the protagonist of the series, using an array of weapons and magical powers to fight many different types of enemies, the vast majority of which are creatures based on Greek mythology.
For most enemies, Kaos can also launch a QTE that involves precision, killing opponents with bloody kills. It depicts a fictional mythical world in a distinctive dark and magical style, combining the imagination and inspiration of many artists.
At the same time, we are committed to the action performance of each character, rendering the fierceness of the battle with extremely exaggerated methods, bringing players a passionate combat experience.

-Charming characters-


All-round display of the unique charm of female characters, enchanting mysterious guardian spirits and plump and sexy star priests.
Match with different fashions to show different styles. With sexy dress-up action, show a different style.

-Battle System-


Imprison the souls of fallen gods, summon them on the battlefield, and release the power of ghosts and gods to destroy everything.
Choose from multiple weapons, axes, hammers, sickles, etc., giving you unique fighting skills. Perform combat combos and skills, transform, bounce, dodge, and flexibly walk among monsters.

-Killing Feast-


Every swing of the blade is accompanied by the bloom of blood, releasing the most primitive desire to fight.
Every time you cross a desperate situation, you are accompanied by the growth of combat skills, and you will be reborn as the strongest warrior.
A variety of exquisite QTE and execution skills, use the blade to interpret your determination, shred the enemy's body, and end the enemy's life. Dodge death with swift movements, master the rhythm and timing of battle, and deliver the fatal blow to nightmarish foes!

-Artistic-


Reborn from hell, walk through the lava land, step on the polar ice field, break into the mysterious cave, and finally stop in the dark underworld. The real and magical world is shaped with rich architecture, showing you the magnificent sight of the Nordic style in dark style. Delicate lighting, changeable weather, and magical art style together create an immersive scene experience. Take the highest glory in the collision of the blades, or be taken away from everything. In the face of powerful evil spirits and giant monsters, weak lives are fleeting.
Nearly 100 kinds of monsters and gods are reproduced in front of your eyes with their unique shapes. Facing their ferocious offensive, shocking power. Can you keep your courage up!

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains strong language, violence and nudity.
